body:
That’s difficult because I rely on diffs a lot for efficiency. Otherwise I spend a lot of time analyzing all the code, and I need to do it carefully to see if just unnecessary formatting, or if there was a real change ;)

As you see it’s a double edged sword, and we generally don’t have strict style rules. I’m ok with clang format but please run it only on the lines you actually edit. Thanks!

body_text:
That’s difficult because I rely on diffs a lot for efficiency. Otherwise I spend a lot of time analyzing all the code, and I need to do it carefully to see if just unnecessary formatting, or if there was a real change ;)
As you see it’s a double edged sword, and we generally don’t have strict style rules. I’m ok with clang format but please run it only on the lines you actually edit. Thanks!
